text: Tokyo Kingdom, warehouse district.
Asagi-san and I had broken through the UFS squad surrounding us and found ourselves in a part of town lined with abandoned buildings.

name: Asagi
text: So the real lucky boar is here...

name: Me
text: ...No doubt about it. I can clearly feel his presence coming from inside.
Before our eyes was a desolate building that looked like it had been abandoned quite a long time ago.
And Kiyomaro, the auspicious beast we'd been chasing, seemed to be lurking in there.

name: Asagi
text: It's... 11:30 PM. I guess we just barely made it.

name: Me
text: Yeah... But we have to defeat him by today, right?
In that case, I couldn't relax just yet.

name: Asagi
text: Yes. Let's both be very careful.

name: Asagi
text:
The divine giant boar, Kiyomaroー
We don't even know how great his power is either.

name: Me
text: Yeah...
We nodded to each other nervously and stepped into the abandoned building.
Tracking the presence that only I could detect, we proceeded deeper into the abandoned building.

And thenー
we heard the sound of a man and a woman arguing from deep within the darkness.

name: Man
text: Th-That's not true~! I wasn't thinking of anything dirty at allー

name: Man
text: I just want to chat and get to a little friendlier with you, you know♪

name: Woman
text: Chat!? And besides, I told you already, I need to catch the last train!! I'm going home!!

name: Man
text: Ah! O-Oh no... Don't say you're going home~

name: Woman
text: Enough! Stop touching me, pervert! I should never have come here with a man like you who's just trying to get lucky!
ー*Smack!!*
Following the sound of a loud slap, a woman in a flashy outfit walked out, right past our hiding spot.

name: Asagi & Me
text:
"Asagi: (Huh...?)
Me: (Wha...?)"
...What was that?
Asagi-san and I looked at each other.
Why had we heard such an idiotic conversation coming from where the lucky boar was hiding?

Andー
maybe it was because I had been so stunned by what we had just witnessed.
My eyes met those of the man she had left behind.
Ahー
ーThe man looked exactly like me.
Exactly like Fuma Kotaro, my human self.
But right now, the real Kotaro (me), had taken the form of a giant boar.
Which meant the "Fuma Kotaro" in front of me was none other thanー

name: Kotaro(?)
text: Hehehe, a giant boar... You must be the human I summoned as my "scapegoat." You've done well to make it this far...

name: Me
text: H-Hey, wait a second!? You... Why are you talking like some kind of last boss as if nothing happened!?
I instinctively retorted with all my might.

name: Kotaro(?)
text: What is it, human...? Don't you know it's rude to suddenly interrupt when other people are talking?

name: Me
text: I mean, rude isn't how I'd put it...? Didn't you just get dumped and slapped in the face by that woman you picked up?

name: Kotaro(?)
text: No, that's...

name: Me
text: And your tone of voice changed too.
The Kotaro doppelganger fell silent.

name: Me
text: ...Am I wrong?

name: Kotaro(?)
text: Hehehe... And what of it, human?

name: Me
text: That's what I'd like to ask you! What is a divine being doing picking up girls? And you got dumped to boot.

name: Kotaro(?)
text: Even divine beings want to get hot and heavy with the ladies... Hehehe... A mere mortal like you would never understand this feeling.

name: Kotaro(?)
text: And she just went home because she had to catch the last train, I wasn't dumped or anything.

name: Me
text: R-Right... If that's what you'd like to believe...
Perhaps unable to stand the sheer nonsense of our conversation, Asagi-san jumped in.

name: Asagi
text: Um... Do you mind if I just kill already? We're almost out of time.

name: Me
text: Ah, right! Prepare yourself! You're gonna give me back my human body right now!
I had almost forgotten. The deadline was just around the corner.

name: Kotaro(?)
text: Hehehe... So you're going to fight me? This will be interesting.

name: Kotaro(?)
text: The ceremony will be over soon. I'll take on you foolish humans in my true form...
Thenー
A pale light enveloped me and my doppelgangerー

name: Me
text: Ah!? I-I turned back!?
My form was no longer that of a boar.
When the light faded, I was back in my familiar body.
And, when I lifted my face toward a foreboding presenceー

name: Me
text: Whoa!? That's a big-ass boar!!

name: Kiyomaro
text: Hehehe...
Standing there was Kiyomaro, the lucky boar, in its true formー
The divine boar was so enormous that I had to crane my neck to look up at it.

name: Kiyomaro
text: This is my true form... Foolish humans, I'll crush you in an instant... Ah, ow!?

name: Kiyomaro
text: Oof, I hit my head on the ceiling...

name: Me
text: What the hell are you doing...?
The ceiling of the building was not very high.
It seemed that he was so massive that his head and back scraped against the it.

name: Asagi
text: Behavior and attitude aside... He does seem to be powerful. Don't let your guard down!

name: Me
text: Of course!! I'll knock him right out and add the meat to our New Year's ozoni!!
Asagi-san and I got into position. Our battle with Kiyomaro, the divine giant boar, had begun.
